lead_paragraph: The appointments of James Murdoch and Jane Skinner Goodell will expand the Dia board to 18 members.

headline.print_headline: James Murdoch Joins Dia Foundation Board
headline.main: Dia Art Foundation Adds Two Board Members

snippet: The appointments of James Murdoch and Jane Skinner Goodell will expand the Dia board to 18 members.
abstract: Former news anchor Jane Skinner Goodell and 21st Century Fox chief executive James Murdoch join Dia Foundation board.
